title: ZenStream.Live
description: Have you ever missed a crucial moment during a live sports match, concert or lecture because you had to take a 15-minute break? Pause, rewind, replay, seek up to 6 hours back in HD live stream with chat. APIs to automate stream creation, recording & embedding. Multiple Concurrent Streams from a single account. Authenticated or Anonymous chat options. Schedule Streams in Advance. Automatic Recording to VOD for website embed. Customise Player controls & colors.
